input.sentences: washing and drying the t-shirt for the race .
the racers gathered around getting instruction .
another kind of racer gets ready .
output.sentences: Everyone was excited to see the shirts they had gathered for this years 50k.
Yet not excited enough to purchase or wear those shirts of course.
They knew if they followed these signs though, that eventually they would complete the gruelling challenge.
Or find Glenn, who liked to hang out in the woods in his inflatable muscle suit to intimidate the local squirrels.
Upon successfully avoiding Glenn and finishing the 50 k, participants can finally take care of their calloused and broken bodies.
